user.name: The Higher Pitch
user.bio: Results-driven developer with expertise in automation, system integration, and CRM solutions. Skilled in building efficient workflows with n8n, integrating platforms like WordPress, Zoho CRM, and APIs to streamline business processes. Passionate about solving real-world problems with clean, scalable, and automated solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
